title: Avaravar Vazhkaiyil Lyrics Pandavar Bhoomi
stanzas:
<div>
Avaravar Vazhkaiyil Lyrics Pandavar Bhoomi

Avar avar vaazhkaiyil
aayiram aayiram maatrangal
andha ninaivugal nenjinil
thirumbida thirumbida yaekkangal

adhu oru azhagiya
nila kaalam
kanavinil thinam thinam
ula pogum (2)

nilavugal sernthu
boomiyil vaazhthathe
adhu oru porkaalam

Avar avar vaazhkaiyil
aayiram aayiram maatrangal
andha ninaivugal nenjinil
thirumbida thirumbida yaekkangal

kaatrum kooda engaludan
iravinil thoonga idam kaetkum.
mazhai thuli kooda
en thaayin madiyinil
thavala thinam yaengum.

naththai koottin neer podhum
engalin thaagam
theerthu kolvom.

kaththum kadalum
kaikatta kavidhaigal
pole vazhnthu vandhom

thaayin madiyil
thinam irandhu
kaalaiyil meendum
uyir peruvom.

kanavinai kaalaiyil
mozhi peyarthu
solli solli sugamaai
thinam sirippom.

ayindhezhuthu pudhu mozhiyai
ariya vaiththaal en annai.
annan thangai ayyvarumae
nesam kondom tamil mannai

nilavugal sernthu
boomiyil vaazhthathe
adhu oru porkaalam
avar avar ...

annai oottiya pidi sottril
aayul muzhukka
pasi marandhom

otrai kannil adi pattaal
paththu kannil vali kandom

palli koodam thanthathillai
paasam ennum nool ondrai
vedhangal naangum
sonnadhillai engal kadhai
pol verondrai

kangalum neerthuli kandathillai
azhuthida avaigalum pazhagavillai
karuppaa sivappaa
theriyavillai kavalaigal
idhuvarai mulaithathillai

segarithu vaipatharkku
thaevai endru edhuvumillai
iravanukkum engalukkum
idaiveligal irundhadhillai

nilavugal sernthu
boomiyil vaazhthathe
adhu oru porkaalam

Avar avar vaazhkaiyil
aayiram aayiram maatrangal
andha ninaivugal nenjinil
thirumbida thirumbida yaekkangal

adhu oru azhagiya
nila kaalam
kanavinil thinam thinam
ula pogum (2)

nilavugal sernthu
boomiyil vaazhthathe
adhu oru porkaalam
